title: 1935년 Hale 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Hale. 판결일: 1935-02-27. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Rabbitt HALE v. STATE
**판결일**: 1935-02-27
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX

**판사**: Hawkins

## 변호인

Chandler & Chandler, of Stephenville, for appellant., Lloyd W. Davidson, State’s Atty., of Austin, for thé State.

## 인용

- 79 S.W.2d 1116

## 판결문 요약


HAWKINS, Judge.
Conviction is for transporting intoxicating liquor; punishment being two years in the penitentiary. ,
The indictment is fatally defective. See Offield v. State (Tex. Cr. App.) 75 S.W.(2d) 882; Haynie v. State (Tex. Cr. App.) 76 S.W.(2d) 133; Oliver v. State (Tex. Cr. App.) 76 S.W.(2d) 134.
The judgment is reversed, and the prosecution ordered dismissed under the present indictment.
...
